address.streetAddress: 7 Brimley Rd S Bluffers Park Marina

description: Are you looking for an amazing Epic Fishing Adventure? Lake Ontario offers a rare and memorable fishing challenge and Epic Sportfishing is always up for the challenge! Don't miss out on your opportunity to fish Lake Ontario with your family, friends and co-workers. Join Captain Aaron in Toronto for an Epic adventure that you won't soon forget!

reviews.title: Great evening with BIG fish! Easy booking fun had by all :)
text: What an amazing experience! Jon was a wonderful host. And oh boy did we catch fish, you can count on Jon to be very dedicated to making sure you have an awesome time.
My niece and I caught 10+ fish over 10 pounds. He did a great job helping my less experienced niece on the trip. You don‚Äôt need to know what you‚Äôre doing. Just be ready to catch some HOGS!
Best fish of the day was 23.5 pounds.

reviews.title: An epic day with epic sportsfishing!
text: We've done this before, but Aaron provided an especially good experience.  He is extremely knowledgeable and willing to share that knowledge as much or as little as customers desire.  His commitment to customer satisfaction is obvious.  And of course, it helped that the fish were biting!  We will be repeat customers.

reviews.title: WOW fishing with Epic Sportfishing!
text: This was our first fishing on Lake Ontario. What a fantastic experience. We caught our limit of salmon and rainbows during two 5 hour trips. Super kudos to Aaron. A super guy and guide who keeps his boat and gear in top shape. Our outings were in the morning but next time we will book one morning and one late afternoon/night. Our fish were all filleted and bagged. Super service.

reviews.title: EPIC, ONCE AGAIN !!
text: Following last year's fantastic adventure with Epic Sport Fishing, we couldn't resist returning for more in 2023. Once again, our fishing trips of June 20 and 21 were  exceptional !!

Captain Aaron, with his remarkable expertise and enthusiasm, amazed us once again. His sharp eye and swift reflexes allowed us to reel in several impressive catches, including big salmons and a 12 pounds rainbow trout - Memories that still brings smiles to our faces ! "How he can do that, we still don't know, even though we are experienced fishermen with hundreds of fishing trips under our belts. His skill on the water are truly unmatched.
The boat is simply great - impeccably clean, very comfortable and fitted with top-quality fishing equipment.

Our heartfelt thanks to Aaron and  Epic Sport Fishing for our memorable journey. Your unwavering dedication to providing an unparalleled fishing experience truly sets you apart. We‚Äôre eagerly looking forward to meeting again on the water next year!

reviews.title: Excellent all the way!
text: Aaron is a great captain, very knowledgeable, and has all the gear one could possibly imagine.  And he can find and deliver the big fish - cleans them, too!

reviews.title: First-rate
text: Just a wonderful experience with a terrific guide -- knowledeable, teched-up, and a first-rate conversationalist. My two young sons loved Aaron as well. Caught a few little guys and then hooked a 25-pound salmon and later a huge -- maybe 15 pound steelhead.

reviews.title: Another great day with epic sportfishing!!
text: Another great day of fishing with Aaron. This was our 4th time out with him and he delivered as always. I wouldn‚Äôt go out with anyone else!!

reviews.title: FISHING EXPERIENCE OF A LIFETIME !!
text: Thanks to those who wrote reviews on TripAdvisor about Epic Sport Fishing. Based on all the comments, I booked with Epic Sport Fishing and had a fantastic experience with my friends.

Me and two of my friends fished on the morning of June 25 and 26 (2022) and each day the experience was exceptional! We couldn't have had a better captain than Aaron, an exceptional captain, passionate about what he does and very fun to be around.

Each day, the first of many Chinook salmon was in the boat within 45 minutes of leaving the dock! We were impressed to see Aaron in action. No one in our group could figure out (we thought we were experienced fishermen ! ) how he could see the fish biting on one of the many rods so quickly while running the boat with a smile on his face, it seems that he has eyes in the back of his head!
The boat is very clean and comfortable and the fishing equipment is great.
We all enjoyed our two half days of fishing. It was a fantastic experience for our group and that is why we have already booked for next year!
Many thanks to Epic Sport Fishing and its Captain for the fantastic memories!
Sylvain

reviews.title: MOST EPIC WAY TO FULFILL A DREAM
text: This is an amazing day. Aaron is an awesome Captain and made my brothers 60th birthdayone of the most memorable ones of his life. My brother has MS and Aaron went out of his way to make this a fun amazing and memorable trip. Thanks you from the bottom of my heart we will ne back for sure.

reviews.title: "Catch" Yourself Some Fun and Adventure!
text: My wife and I booked a trip with Epic Sportfishing on a recent trip to Toronto. Long story short, we had a blast! We could not have asked for a better captain and guide in Aaron, the owner. The boat and fishing tackle were all in exceptional condition and Aaron was focused on making sure that we had a memorable experience. We caught coho, chinook, and Atlantic salmon, along with a lake trout. Aside from the fishing which was super-fun, we really enjoyed talking with Aaron. I'm not exaggerating when I say that it felt like we were out on the lake with a friend. And, Aaron's general knowledge of Toronto was much appreciated for us out-of-towners. We would highly recommend booking a trip with Epic Sportfishing if are looking to get out on Lake Ontario!

reviews.title: Great Experience
text: Captain Aaron knows what he's doing out on the water. Great guide, great boat and great fishing. Will definitely book with Epic Sportfishing next time we go out.

reviews.title: Great days and memories worth a lifetime!
text: My wife, son and I had an amazing time with Aaron! We are total novices at fishing yet managed to reel in three huge salmon and a rainbow trout. The wind looked like it may be rough out there and Aaron kept an eye on it stayed in touch with us all the way through. We made the decision to head out only hours before the charter was scheduled but it just goes to show you how Aaron really wanted us to be comfortable out there and made sure we knew the conditions. We were fortunate and even though it called for 9 miles per hour wind, it was pretty smooth. Now onto the fishing, there are no guarantees with anything in life especially fishing but Aaron isn't just some move-'em in and move 'em out fishing charter. He has the experience, boat and equipment to definitely increase your probability of getting action. Think Yoda and Jedi Knight. Aaron was talking to us one second and as if he had some form of sixth sense, suddenly spun around and grabbed a pole that was bending, made sure a fish was hooked on it and then handed then to my son and coached him on how to reel it in. Aaron could tell from about 25 feet out that it was a rainbow trout. I couldn't even see it in the wake of the boat! And this is how our night went with small periods of conversation and downtime and bursts of action. This fishing charter was the best part of our week long trip to NIagara and Toronto. Many thanks to Aaron for a great time and memories worth a lifetime!

reviews.title: "Epic" is an understatement!!
text: We located Aaron's "EPIC Sportfishing" through research on the internet.  We had previously hired charters on Manitoulin Island with very limited success therefore decided we would change venues and head to the Toronto area.
This was our first charter with Aaron and he did not dissapoint whatsoever.  We began our "Epic" day at 15:30 hrs.  The sight lines of the city were amazing then the fishing began.
Aaron is a masterful captain of his boat.  He never once stopped either navigating, tending to the lines or engaging in conversation.  His knowledge is vast and was a pleasure to spend time with.

Now lets cut to the brass tacks, the fishing was outstanding giving my father and I the opportunity to catch keep and release several fish.  The opportunity to reel in large Chinook was second to none.  It was an experience that neither of us will stop talking about for some time.
If you are inexperienced with reeling in 20+ lbs of fish Aaron will take the time to walk you through the entire experience therefore is suitable for people of all ages.
Highly recommended and we will certainly sign up with Aaron for another charter in the near future.
The highlight of the evening was the double header just prior to calling it a night.
Thanks Aaron for the "Epic" experience!!!

reviews.title: Fantastic day fishing!
text: Our family had a great time fishing with Aaron--he made the trip so easy and so much fun!  He even stayed out on the lake longer than our charter time to make sure we all got the chance to reel in a huge salmon. Our kids (13, 12 and 10) all loved it!  We will definitely book another trip next time we are in Toronto!

reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
text: My family, with 2 Australian friends who are avid fishermen, have just returned from an afternoon out on Lake Ontario with Aaron. Every single one of them caught a salmon - and they were absolutely thrilled. Aaron stayed out on the water for 5 hours and was a knowledgeable and supportive captain. We would highly recommend Epic Sportfishing if you are looking for a wonderful fishing experience - and if you follow Aaron's tips on what to bring, you'll be all set.

reviews.title: Repeat customer, always great experience!!
text: We did our second charter with Aaron on Lake Ontario last week and it was awesome again.  Aaron knows his fishing and is a great captain in regards to personality and hospitality.  I would recommend Aaron to anybody wanting to land some Lake Ontario chinook, steelhead, and coho.  He is great for anybody from novice to expert.  We look forward to going out with him again!

reviews.title: Great time despite the weather!
text: Family of four including two teenage boys wanting to fish during our visit to the area/Niagara Falls. The weather was uncooperative and initially it was determined we could not go out. However, Aaron was gracious enough to keep in touch with us as the day wore on and when the weather improved, the trip was back on. The boat and fishing equipment are very high quality. Aaron worked very hard to make sure the boys had opportunities to catch some fish. We hooked a lot more than we got in the boat! It ended up being a pleasant afternoon and evening on the water with both boys getting nice catches!

reviews.title: boat charters
text: had a great time with Aaron as our host for the day out on lake Ontario, we caught lots of fish too!...one on the leaderboard!!

reviews.title: Great Experience!
text: Went with a group of 4, and all of us had the absolute best time. Aaron did a fantastic job instructing and put us on the fish almost immediately.
Top notch equipment and great for all levels of fishing experience.
Highly recommend! You won‚Äôt be disappointed.

reviews.title: Great Night Fishing with Aaron
text: We were visiting Niagara Falls celebrating my boyfriends 40th Birthday and his sons 13th Birthday, we had a great night on the lake, all of us caught fish.  Aaron was great at finding the fish and doing all work, all we had to do was bring the fish in the boat..  I would highly recommend Aaron and Epic Sport-fishing if you are looking for a professional and knowledgeable guide, I assure you, you will not be disappointed!!

reviews.title: Awesome experience!
text: Captain Aaron was awesome!  Had a great time, caught some great fish!  Definitely recommended. My kids want to come again‚Ä¶ everyday‚Ä¶

reviews.title: Awesome family experience!
text: Just had an amazing day with Aaron with my son, dad, brother, buddy and his son. Aaron knows his stuff, is friendly, and patient with the kids as he guided us as we reeled in a handful of huge salmon on Lake Ontario. He even cleaned and filleted our catches and sent us home with all our fish in freezer bags. Thank you Aaron, we have memories for a lifetime!

reviews.title: Awesome Day
text: Captain Arron was very honest about the possibility of high winds and no fish. But under a Harvest Moon and a westerly wind we got lucky. I can‚Äôt say enough about the charter. If you are seriously going to catch fish, why go with anyone else? Excellent

reviews.title: Fun Day
text: Out with some friends on October 1.  Excellent experience.   Captain Aaron communicated the potential conditions the day before.  There was a good roll on the water but the boat handled it quite comfortably.

Excellent equipment.   Captain Aaron was very experienced and knowledgeable.  Several bait options, techniques searching for correct water temperatures  were utilized to maximize success.  Lots of fish.
Would highly recommend

reviews.title: Fun?  WOW!!
text: Fantastic time.  Humble servant-hearted captain.  Top of the line equipment.  Caught fish!!  (13 word summary - if you want to hear more, read on).  We went out on July 30, 2020,  2 good friends and  3 kids, ages 12-17.  Our main goal was 1)  for our boys to have the experience of catching big fish  2)  for the  2 adults (who are really just big kids at heart) to catch big fish.  Aaron is a low talker (for us Seinfeld fans) who reminds me of the world's most interesting fisherman (for us Dos Equis fans).  He works extremely hard to ensure all we did was reel in the fish.  At the end, Aaron even stayed out later for us because he really wanted one of us to catch one last big fish.  And amazingly, it happened.....take a look at this pic.  I recommend this day trip for anyone who wants to catch big fish, experience the wonders of nature, and meet a passionate professional fisherman who's greatest joy is the success of his charge and witnessing the enthrallment in our faces.

reviews.title: Excellent
text: We met Aaron at Bluffers Park Marina late in the afternoon. He had called me ahead of time to let me know about conditions on the lake and so we decided to start a bit later to avoid the potential for seasickness. That was helpful. We were not expecting too much but were hoping for a few strikes and hoped to land one or two fish. Well Aaron definitely knew how to coax the fish out of hiding as we landed six salmon in the space of 4 hours including three 20+ pound Chinook salmon. At one stage right before we went in we landed three salmon simultaneously. It was truly an awesome experience. I was hoping my son would get the chance to experience real salmon fishing and we got way more than that. I won't forget it.  Overall, it was a great day out. Aaron is extremely knowledgeable and personable. Highly recommended.

reviews.title: Son's High School Graduation gift.
text: My wife and I arranged this for our son's high school graduation.  He  had the time of his life.  (Saturday, July 4th, 2020) He caught many fish and learned a lot for Aaron.  He told me it was one the best times he had ever had.  Aaron was great and we can't thank him enough.  My son is already planning to return with a bunch of his friends.  Thanks Aaron.

reviews.title: Truly epic, an amazing experience!
text: I had booked the 2.30 pm afternoon fishing tour with Aaron/Epic Sportfishing for mid September in advance for me and my parents from Germany (I put my comment under Family) From booking to arrival at the Marina in Scarborough, to the fishing time on the lake, cutting filets and return the only one comment I can do is: truly amazing. Aaron is a super friendly guy, an expert, a great host with the right view for both the big picture and the details. My parents are still talking about it and we came back with salmon and trout filets after a wonderful day.
My parents said: ‚Äú...a unique adventure ‚Äú!
Thanks Aaron!
Michael (Living in Richmond Hill)

reviews.title: A memorable day with Epic Sportfishing!
text: I chose Epic Sportfishing for an afternoon/evening fishing experience with my two sons, and an experience it was!    From the moment we departed Bluffer's Marina, Aaron was totally focused on finding fish.   His boat is clean and well equipped, and we found Aaron to be extremely knowledgeable and eager to make our day special.   The fishing was excellent, and the experience memorable.  You couldn't make a better choice for a fishing experience on Lake Ontario.

reviews.title: A fabulous experience
text: OMG if you want a fabulous salmon fishing experience book with Aaron.  The cleanest boat, the best personal service you could ever find.  Your fish are cleaned and filleted  in the cleanest manner  I have ever seen.  This was our first time and we will be back next season for sure.  Robert says this was the best fishing charter he has ever been one.  Thank you Aaron for such a special day!  Robert, Erika and Chandi!

reviews.title: The best fishing charter ive ever been on and will continue to use  by!!!!!
text: Aaron the owner of Epic Fishing gave me the best experience i have ever had ... This charter was the first i had ever been on and its the only one i will ever go on. Aaron made the experience of the charter what i was hoping for ... hes a great guy laughs and jokes with you makes sure his clients are happy and comfortable ... i give Aaron and Epic a 5 star and will continue to use him and reccomend him to everyone i know .

reviews.title: 2 Thumbs Up for Epic Sportfishing
text: I had never been on a fishing excursion before so I was a bit apprehensive but Aaron was great to deal with.  He made us all very comfortable, he was very patient, gave great pointers and we all had a great time.  Aaron is very knowledgeable.  We had such a good experience the first time around that we booked a second trip for a few weeks later and it was awesome!  I would definitely use Epic Sportfishing again and would recommend them to anyone looking to do a fishing excursion.

reviews.title: Excellent Experience
text: I booked with Aaron for my partner's 40th birthday and boy oh boy was it a hit! We booked the early morning slot and got onto the water without delay. Aaron was knowledgeable and super kind! He was patient for a beginner like me and a wonderful addition for experts like my partner. You really learn about the type of fish on the lake and marine life preservation. So don't be afraid to ask questions! Bring water, snacks, sunscreen, a hat and a great attitude!

reviews.title: Epic experience indeed!
text: Aron, I hoped for a memorable fishing experience as a birthday gift to my husband. You definitely delivered! It is evident that you are a master of your craft! As I write this review the stories of our great catch and our smiling pictures are circulated around the world üòÄ. Our friends went fishing before with other companies and their experience was not as good so they tried to lower my expectations. I counted to differ and I was right. We are now making plans for our next trip with you! Thanks again!

reviews.title: Incredible experience
text: Aaron was not only a great skipper and guide but also a strong promoter of Ontario Sporsfishing industry.  We learn a lot about sustainable fishing in Lake Ontario and appreciate his passion and enthusiasm about fishing. What an experience to fish salmon and trouts just outside of Toronto.  Highly recommend to give it a try and to come back for more for a chance to catch the 40 pounders.

reviews.title: Awesome fishing trip!!
text: Aaron is super knowledgeable and friendly . Had an awesome day. Definitely booking with him again!!!!

reviews.title: Awesome fishing trip
text: Awesome time. Caught some huge salmon! Aaron is a beauty. Can‚Äôt wait to eat the salmon I caught the Aaron filleted for us

reviews.title: Epic Team Excursion!
text: Our team was generously treated by our boss to this incredible experience as a token of appreciation. There were six of us and we went in the AM :)
We caught a total of nine fish, four salmon (King and Coho) and 5 trout (Rainbow and Silver), the largest weighed almost 20 lbs and some salmon even had roe.

Erin was a great Captain, he was extremely hard-working and knowledgeable. It was thanks to him that everyone caught a fish, including myself which I wasn't sure would be possible. We shared so many laughs and even ate birthday cake for breakfast, haha!
Thank you so much, Erin for such an amazing time, our team made some wonderful memories that day.
We highly recommend Epic Sportfishing!
